headline.print_headline: Seeking Billions, Ontario Sues Tobacco Companies
headline.seo: Ontario Sues Tobacco Companies for Health Care Costs
headline.main: Seeking Billions, Ontario Sues Tobacco Companies

docs.lead_paragraph: The province is seeking 50 billion Canadian dollars from several companies, including the Altria Group, under a new law.
docs.snippet: The province is seeking 50 billion Canadian dollars from several companies, including the Altria Group, under a new law.
